options.swapp:
apiVersion: core.oam.dev/v1alpha2
kind: ApplicationConfiguration
spec:
  parameterValues:
    - name: CLUSTER_ID
      value: master
    - name: NAMESPACE_ID
      value: sreworks-aiops
    - name: STAGE_ID
      value: prod
    - name: APP_ID
      value: dataops
  components:
    - dataInputs: []
      dataOutputs: []
      dependencies: []
      revisionName: INTERNAL_ADDON|productopsv2|_
      scopes:
        - scopeRef:
            apiVersion: apps.abm.io/v1
            kind: Cluster
            name: '{{ Global.CLUSTER_ID }}'
        - scopeRef:
            apiVersion: apps.abm.io/v1
            kind: Namespace
            name: '{{ Global.NAMESPACE_ID }}'
        - scopeRef:
            apiVersion: apps.abm.io/v1
            kind: Stage
            name: '{{ Global.STAGE_ID }}'
      parameterValues:
        - name: TARGET_ENDPOINT
          value: prod-flycore-paas-action
          toFieldPaths:
            - spec.targetEndpoint
        - name: STAGE_ID
          value: prod
          toFieldPaths:
            - spec.stageId
    - revisionName: K8S_MICROSERVICE|drilldown|_
      scopes:
        - scopeRef:
            apiVersion: apps.abm.io/v1
            kind: Cluster
            name: '{{ Global.CLUSTER_ID }}'
        - scopeRef:
            apiVersion: apps.abm.io/v1
            kind: Namespace
            name: '{{ Global.NAMESPACE_ID }}'
        - scopeRef:
            apiVersion: apps.abm.io/v1
            kind: Stage
            name: '{{ Global.STAGE_ID }}'
      traits:
        - name: service.trait.abm.io
          runtime: post
          spec:
            ports:
              - protocol: TCP
                port: 80
                targetPort: 5000
      parameterValues: []
    - revisionName: K8S_MICROSERVICE|aisp|_
      scopes:
        - scopeRef:
            apiVersion: apps.abm.io/v1
            kind: Cluster
            name: '{{ Global.CLUSTER_ID }}'
        - scopeRef:
            apiVersion: apps.abm.io/v1
            kind: Namespace
            name: '{{ Global.NAMESPACE_ID }}'
        - scopeRef:
            apiVersion: apps.abm.io/v1
            kind: Stage
            name: '{{ Global.STAGE_ID }}'
      traits:
        - name: service.trait.abm.io
          runtime: post
          spec:
            ports:
              - protocol: TCP
                port: 80
                targetPort: 7001
        - name: gateway.trait.abm.io
          runtime: post
          spec:
            path: /aiops/aisp/**
            servicePort: 80
            serviceName: '{{ Global.STAGE_ID }}-aiops-aisp.sreworks-aiops'
      parameterValues:
        - name: REPLICAS
          value: 1
          toFieldPaths:
            - spec.replicas
        - name: Global.DB_NAME
          value: aiops_aisp
        - name: Global.DB_PORT
          value: 3306
        - name: Global.CACHE_TYPE
          value: local
        - name: Global.DB_USER
          value: root
        - name: Global.DB_HOST
          value: '{{ Global.STAGE_ID }}-{{ Global.APP_ID }}-mysql.sreworks-dataops'
        - name: Global.DB_PASSWORD
          value: cb56b5is5e21_c359b42223
options.name: 智能运维平台
